Package com.htsmart.wristband.dfu

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DfuCallback
    The DFU progress is as follows：

    1.DfuCallback.PROGRESS_REQUEST_ENTER_OTA
    2.DfuCallback.PROGRESS_SEARCH_OTA_DEVICE
    3.DfuCallback.PROGRESS_SEND_OTA_PACKET
    4.The progress of send OTA data packet form 0 to 100.
    5.DfuCallback.PROGRESS_SUCCESS

    If an error has occurred, DfuCallback.onError(int) method will callback.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DfuManager
    Use for DFU operation.The DFU procedure is as follows：

    1.Request Enter OTA.
    If you have connected to the wristband, request the wristband enter OTA mode with IDevicePerformer.cmd_requestEnterOTA() method.
    You don't need to call in other places yourself, DfuManager will help you do this work.
    If there is not a connected wristband, go to the next step.
